maintainer.description: The creator of this ebuild, but not the official maintainer

pkgmetadata.longdescription: TomeNET is a multiplayer fantasy dungeon exploration game based on the works of J.R.R. Tolkien. It is a game that emphasizes intricate, challenging, and varied gameplay over graphics. Hundreds of different monsters in randomly-generated, unpredictable dungeons will strive to slay you by various means, and you counter - if you survive - by developing the skills of your choice and wielding mighty artifacts.

use.flag: Enable libX11 display/flag> Enable Xaw3d display
